title: [Large-scale] Challenges in Implementing E-Learning in Higher Education Institutions in Sub-Saharan Africa: Blended/Online Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic higher education systems and digital teaching tools
context.additional_context: Case-based learning reflecting infrastructure constraints, cultural contexts, and persistent technology access challenges in Sub-Saharan Africa.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major technical/social barriers to e-learning implementation in higher education institutions in Sub-Saharan Africa.
Learners can propose practical strategies considering local contexts when designing blended or fully online courses.
Learners can develop and apply formative assessment tools for evaluating and improving e-learning systems.

resources: Sub-Saharan Africa E-Learning Case Study Report

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
